caption.p: An outline for Î²-caryophyllene compound biosynthesis pathway operating through in vitro method of A. vulgaris plant. IDS, isopentenyl diphosphate synthase; IDI, isopentenyl diphosphate isomerase; GGPP, geranylgeranyl diphosphate; DXS, 1-deoxy- D-xylulose-5-phosphate synthase; DXR, 1-deoxy- D-xylulose-5-phosphate reductoisomerase.
